nodes.text: Red Sin Chimaera was a hyperspace quadrant in the Endor system, home to the Red Sin Chimaera Nebula.

During 1 ABY, the Death Watch could be found lurking inside the cover of the Red Sin Chimaera Nebula. They would wait silently, striking at the last moment in hopes of a successful kill. For this reason, many thought of the Death Watch as animals, feasting upon the helpless to survive.
Aside from the Death Watch, Black Sun starships could be found in this quadrant, and Ikito Elfwannabe was sighted in the area. Imperial pilots were told to apprehend him on sight.
